<script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
        $("input#submit").val("GUARDAR");
        
        
        
    //Flag para reencaminhar para o processo
    window.sessionStorage.setItem("previousPage", "importar");
    window.sessionStorage.setItem("nwf", $("input#n_processo").val());
    window.sessionStorage.setItem("servico", "procu");
    });
    
     
</script>
